participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is imaginative and a bit introverted, often preferring the company of her video games over people.
participant_1.background: i don't have many friends. i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i love to play pobox. i hate school. i'm a 12 year old girl.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is friendly and hardworking, with a passion for his craft and a love for animals.
participant_2.background: i have 5 cats. my cats are very special to me. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.
